title: NSE 2024
description:
New Space Economy, expo and conference, was created in 2019 with the scope of becoming the international reference event on the new space economy challenges and perspectives, organized by Fiera Roma.
With the 6th edition scheduled on 16-18 December, 2024 in Fiera Roma, the event offers three days of works, to discuss and cultivate new connections, exploring new collaborations within the space sector and beyond.

The NSE 2024 format consists of an exhibition section, a main conference session completed by a rich networking and b2b program, and focuses on the ability of the new space economy to give rise, from space, to new terrestrial markets based on technological innovation.

And these markets experience these days continuous evolution and offer unprecedented opportunities.
